articles.content:
Mr Srinivasan is the author of the best-selling book "The Network State"
Prime Minister Narendra Modi in a post on X, formerly Twitter praised Indian-American entrepreneur and investor Balaji S Srin… [+2872 chars]

articles.author: N Mahalakshmi
articles.title: Ridham Desai lists 6 most important things to watch out for in the new year - Moneycontrol
articles.description: In an exclusive interview to Moneycontrol, the Morgan Stanley managing director says interest rates in India are unlikely to be cut until the Federal Reserve begins reducing them. If the US economy lands soft, it will be good for India, he adds
articles.content:
The 2024 Lok Sabha elections are the most critical factor that could drive markets in the coming 12 months, Ridham Desai, managing director, Morgan Staley, has said.

articles.author: George Mathew
articles.title: Over Rs 93,240 crore of stressed unsecured loans in bank portfolios - The Indian Express
articles.description: Banks have been increasing their loan exposure to NBFCs. It has gone up from Rs 7.75 lakh crore in March 2021 to Rs 9.23 lakh crore by September 2022. The Centre for Advanced Financial Research and Learning (CAFRAL), set up by the RBI, had recently raised con…
articles.content: While banks are blaming non-banking finance companies, especially fintechs which operate digital lending apps, for the sharp rise in unsecured loans, they themselves are sitting on over Rs 93,240 cro… [+4415 chars]
